sentences.sContent: Product has wood door luxury, composite door, door splint .
sentences.sContent_eng: Product has wood door luxury, composite door, door splint .
sentences.sCn: 产品有实木豪华门、 复合门、 夹板门。

remMethod.val: sp + lint(棉绒) → 用棉绒和夹板把病人受伤的腿包扎好 → 夹板

words.tran: 破片的；容易裂开的；裂片一般的
碎片；微小的东西；极瘦的人

trans.tranOther: a flat piece of wood, metal etc used for keeping a broken bone in position while it mends
